snippet: LITSKY--Harold, on May 12, 2016. Captain, NYPD (Retired), graduate US Merchant Marine Academy, decorated merchant mariner for his bravery during the Murmansk Run, Chevalier of the Legion d'honneur for his participation in the liberation of France during WWII. Predeceased by Betty, his loving wife of 60 years. Survived by his children, Andy, Eric (Norma), Amy Brachfeld (Alan) and Tom (Rosemary). His beloved Sylvia. Devoted grandfather to Jason (Michelle), Jonathan (Marlee), Robert Litsky, Justin and Melissa Brachfeld, Alexandra (Stephen) Billick and Drew (Maria) Taylor. Proud great grandfather of Emerson and Grant Litsky and Zoe Taylor. Funeral services at noon, Sunday, May 15, Riverside-Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. In lieu of flowers, the family requests that contributions be made in his honor to the Southern Poverty Law Center or the social action organization of your choice. 1/3
